fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Erase someone's memories at night. All feedback they would've received will be erased.
- Cover up someone's activities at night, all feedback they would've caused other players in any way will be erased.
- At any time you may choose to restore someone's memories for a specific night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may act up to two times each night, unless you are performing the factional kill.
